REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2854 reute d f BC-WICKES-<WIX>-COMPLETE 06-02 0040

TEXT.TITLE: WICKES <WIX> COMPLETES PURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: Wickes Cos Inc said it has completed the purchase of Dura Corp for an undisclosed amount. Dura, a supplier of automotive equipment, had annual sales of over 100 mln dlrs. Reuter
